name: Five Nights at Sunny's
description:
CONTENT WARNING: LOUD NOISES, JUMPSCARES, FLASHING LIGHTS, BLOOD / POTENTIALLY DISTURBING IMAGES

12AM. You had to use the bathroom, though as you were there the images and spirits that haunt you dominated your mind, and you locked yourself in the bathroom in fear. You chose to stay locked in the bathroom until the morning comes, though little did you know, you are still not safe there. Even with a locked door. Even if you close your eyes. You are left with a sprout mole mask and a camera monitor, which you had left here during the day. Stay awake as long as you can, keep your eyes on the cameras (and your back), and only put on the mask when necessary.

An OMORI-themed FNaF fangame for all the OMORI and FNaF fans out there! Defend yourself from the hallucinations of your friends with the tools you have; as they become more aggressive while your trauma builds up, how far can you get through the week?
